alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 10:41AM MST until November 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Central mountain region, northern Fremont county and the higher elevations of the Pikes Peak region. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
